file_content.text: Thanks, stranger. Didn't think anyone else was fool enough to wander this pile of rubble.
Stupid move, trusting some prig Senator. Jedi Temple's abandoned, he says. No one to fight, only trouble's getting there.
What do we find? Battle droids, Imperial commandos, Sith... we're lucky all they did was take our haul and lock us in here to die.
The Jedi Temple is a sacred place. Your looting stops here.
Now you can leave.
Fine by me. What I'm after isn't worth a cred on the black market anyhow.
Many Jedi died here. Selling their belongings is disrespectful.
You're disturbing the dead.
None of them tried to stop me. This stuff should go to someone who can use it.
Serves you right for stealing from the dead.
You deserved it.
I'm no grave robber. The Senator's got a rightful claim.
Gotta take risks if you want the reward.
Big job means big credits.
I've done the math. I die, I get zero credits.
Do you know what the Imperials are trying to do?
Why are they here?
Besides attack mercs on a legit job? No idea.
You probably should have run.
You had no chance.
I don't run away from a fight, but I'm not dumb enough to go back for more.
Senator Starsnow's after a journal that belonged to his dead kid. Some bigwig Jedi, fell during the Sacking. Journal's all that's left of him.
I feel for the Senator, and his credits, but those commandos have the journal now. They aren't going to spare us twice.
I'll take on the commandos. The Senator should have his son's journal.
They won't have to.
Whatever you say, Master Jedi. But the kid's dead--that journal's not going to bring him back.
I can't let Imperials keep the journal of a fallen Jedi.
I have to do something.
A dead Jedi might be your kin, but he's not mine.
The Senator deserves it more than the Empire.
I'll get that journal.
Suit yourself, soldier--fighting the Empire's your job, not mine.
You won't mind if I claim your reward, then.
Those credits are mine.
Have at it. I'd take bets against you living to spend it.
I can take them.
We came in armed to the teeth. You think you can do better, be my guest.
Senator Starsnow's waiting near the Senate tower. If you can get that journal back, he'll be expecting you.
Thanks for the rescue. Come on, boys. This job's a bust.
That's too bad. [Refuse quest]
Breaks my heart to see good credits go to waste. Should have made the Senator pay up front.
Hello? Anybody who's not an Imperial? If you can hear me, let us out!
